item.title: Customise markdown preview enhanced in vscode
item.description: Step 1: Download vscode markdown preview enhanced plugin in vscode Step 2: On Ubuntu, use shortcut Ctrl + Shift + p to enable vscode command. Step 3: Type to search “Markdown Preview Enhanced: Customize CSS” command Step 4: Then it will open a css file called style.less. Next, just copy the css setting below into that file. That’s it and save the file! /* Please visit the URL below for more information: */ /* https://shd101wyy.

item.title: Set up Envoy dev story on Mac
item.description: This is just a brief instruction. I don’t have much experience on Envoy development. I will add more detailed things in the future when I understand more about Envoy dev story. Set up Envoy dependencies Even though you can follow the instructions on README, you can run this script to install dependencies and run this script to build envoy-static. VSCode Code navigation Trial #1: Default Microsoft C/C++ plugin works okay but misses many library references.

item.title: About me
item.description: G’day. ğŸ˜ I’m a software engineer working on cloud-native applications and microservices. I’m interested in Envoy Proxy and Istio. Occasionally, I wear the “white hat”.
